quest_desc.qdesc: 아르젠타에게 의뢰 수락 수정개울에서 데이비드와 대화 캐더락관문 데커드, 메이, 티아나와 대화. 수정개울에서 데이비드와 대화 수정개울에서 퍼거스와 대화 다크스프림 퇴치 퍼거스와 대화 데이비드와 대화 아르젠타에게 보고. 보상.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Do you realize what kind of high reputations I have now?
(Quest from Argenta in Gray Ruins needed to proceed)

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
How is Silver Swordswoman doing? Things going well for her?
(Quest from Argenta in Gray Ruins needed to proceed)

$Scout Fergus$
Never let you guards down, no matter what happen.
(Quest from Argenta in Gray Ruins needed to proceed)

$Merchant May$
Do you have any business to talk about?
(Quest from Argenta in Gray Ruins needed to proceed)

$Master Sorceress Tiana$
Out of my way if you got nothing to say to me
(Quest from Argenta in Gray Ruins needed to proceed)

$Argenta$
(Argenta has an unhappy expression on her face.
She doesn't looks good)

$Argenta$
I see you have plenty of work on hand. Find me when you have cleared them.
(This quest requires more main scenario and sub quests to be more proceeded)

$Argenta$
It's you. I've been waiting to talk to you.
About that weakling, is that something you brought along with you?

$Argenta$
I couldn't care less about the name. He is plain annoying and irritating. I couldn't even eat my meal in peace and quiet.

$Argenta$
Please clean up your own mess that you have made, I do not want to see them lying around all the time.

$Argenta$
Do I really need to teach you every single thing?
…I've heard disordered footstep sound stopping near Cristal Stream, so it should be there. Go take a look.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I will go take a look at Cristal Stream anyways.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Of course you are going to do it, rightt?
You are the one who brought that annoying pest along with you, Now run along!
<html> $Reputation$</html>

$Argenta$
Really, {user_nick}, is not easy having you as a slave, you know?
Hurry to Cristal Stream and show that little one what he deserved.

$Scout Fergus$
I've heard stories about you, Adventurer David. You are much more brillant than those said rumors. I have a business to take care… I'm thinking about requesting it to Adventurer David. Haha.

$Self-Acclaimed Adventurer David${action:talk}
Oh! Look who's here? Isn't this the right hand man and follower of the Great Adventurer David, {user_nick}? Ha. Ha. Ha. Very nice to see you!!

$Adventurer David$
Lady Argenta finally has started to notice me, The Great Adventurer David! Ha… Took little longer than I expected, but elegant women are cuter when they act tough. Heh. Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Tsk. You have a long way to go, {user_nick}! Don't be so obvious, you Newbie. Heh. Heh. Heh. Lady Argenta's dainty, kind, and innocent love hidden behind her shyness!!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Adventurer David is living in his perfect dream world)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. I am sure guys like you, who has been never been loved by proud lady, have no idea about pure love and their complexed impressions? You should just look at my Great Love and feel inferiority! Ha.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why would I want to do that?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Okay!! I will clearly let you know for sure this time! You must know the Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard in Calderock Village even you are a newbie, right? Go and enquire about the reputation I have in this town.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Little annoying, but I guess it's time for me to give him some reality check.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. You won't be having such disbelief face confirm you are presented with the truth. You will want to go to Lady Argenta and praise me. Heh… Go, Go on already!!

$Adventurer David${action:talk}
Don't forget!! Adventurer's Guild Master is someone who cannot be left out when people of Calderock Village talk about Adventurers!! Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard! I don't deal with just anyone!! Heh. Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
How is Silver hair Swordswoman doing? Everything okay?
(Need go to Adventurer David in Cristal Stream)

$Merchant May$
Yes? How can I help you?
(Need go to Adventurer David in Cristal Stream)

$Master Sorceress Tiana$
Leave me alone if you have nothing to say.
(Need go to Adventurer David in Cristal Stream)

$Adventurer David${action:talk}
Don't forget!! Adventurer's Guild Master is someone who cannot be left out when people of Calderock Village talk about Adventurers!! Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard! I don't deal with just anyone!! Heh. Heh. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He claims himself as the greatest adventurer.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
What did you ask…. Who? Adventurer David?
Adventurer David… Ah, That guy!

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Hm? Well, I don't know much. But he never caused any trouble and his reputation is not so bad. He may not be a bad adventurer after all.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Why do you look so surprised. Haha. He has successfully completed all his mission and he also help out with all little favors asked by villagers.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
If you cannot believe me, listen to them yourself. I heard he did a nice job on what Merchant May asked to do. You should try visit her.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
If you are concern about Adventurer' Adventurer David's reputation, go talk to Merchant May. It should be best to hear it from the people who handed him a job. Haha.

$Merchant May$
Yes? You mean Adventurer David? Ah, Of course I know very well!!
He even helped me out in my shop yesterday.

$Merchant May$
Hey, your words are not making any sense. There is a reason why I requested to an adventurer. Why would they get paid without getting the job done straight? I paid only because he was worth every penny!! Hoho.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> I do not think that way. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant May$
Especially, when I asked him to bring a Hound last time, he has done it extremely nice. Hoho. However, it was covered with Spider Web... As I hear, that's a new trend to bath Hound in Saint Haven, right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>…Sounds more like messenger rather than adventurer.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant May$
He also makes good bouquets, and picked up fruits for me as well. Um... and... Um...

$Merchant May${action:talk}
Anyways, he seem like a great guy. Hoho. I also referred him to a Master Sorceress Tiana since she was looking for a help too. Why don't you go talk to Tiana as well?

$Merchant May$
Master Sorceress Tiana should have also given Adventurer David a job. Why don't you also talk to Tiana to find out more about Adventurer David's reputation?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I guess we do know each other….</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tiana$
Ah, The adventurer who has brought Pure White Orb? Why are you asking about Adventurer David? Do you guys know each other?

$Master Sorceress Tiana$
Really? He looked pretty goofy but was quite capable. I would have not used him if Merchant May didn't recommand him…. He actually had pretty good sense.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> No. Just ....finding out more (I'm kind of surprised ....) </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tiana$
What's that weird expression? Did he run away with your money or something?
Anyways, I don't know what you want to hear from me, but he was doing a pretty good job on what I asked him to do. Yeah, that guy named Adventurer David.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Again, I feel like he's more of messenger boy than an adventurer.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tiana$
He was watering my garden as well as sorting 3 dried roots each pouch…. He was quite meticulous. He also
cooks pretty good.

$Master Sorceress Tiana$
He was cook pretty good food with stinky blue cheese. He was pretty capable unlike how he looks.
Why? Are you trying to assign him a job as well?

$Master Sorceress Tiana$
So.. Anything else that you wish to ask? Else run along now.
(Go back to Cristal Stream to see Adventurer David)

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
What have ou heard about Adventurer David's reputation? …Why are you still look so surprised? Haha.
(Must go back to Cristal Stream to see Adventurer David)

$Merchant May$
Adventurer David is really a nice adventurer. I would have hired him as messenger boy for my shop if possible. Hoho.
(Must go back to Cristal Stream to see Adventurer David)

$Master Sorceress Tiana$$
Why are you curious and asking around about this guy named Adventurer David?
(Must go back to Cristal Stream to see Adventurer David)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yea… Everything thinks that you are a good person.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
How was it? Now you see what kind of reputation I hold? Heh. Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer David${action:talk}
You just found out?! Heh. Heh. Heh. Is never too late to realize by greatness, for that, I am willing to forgive you! Heh. Heh. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No, I am not really curious enough to hear….</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
I was having very serious conversation with Scout Fergus here about my greatness. Heh. Heh. Heh. You curious and interested in the coversation with Scout Fergus? Heh… Well, I will give you the privilege to hear the stories! Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Ha… You are such an ignorant. Heh. Heh. Heh. Once you here stories from Scout Fergus, you will also find out how great I am.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Ah, yes .... It's ... about a man named Adventurer David. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Scout Fergus$
Ah, it you! {user_class} {user_nick}. Thank you for putting so much effort for Calderock Village. We, scouts, feel less burden with your help.

$Scout Fergus$
I have heard about adventurer Adventurer David. I don't really know about him since I have been here at Cristal Stream the whole time, but he seems hold good reputation in town.

$Scout Fergus$
I was about to hand him a job. It's about defeating Shadow Dark Scream at Sanctuary Core. For his reputation, he should be up to the job, right?

$Scout Fergus$
He assures that it will be a piece of cake. Haha. I'm relieved. He said he need a person who can help out some chores… Why not you tag along to past some time?

$Scout Fergus$
Ah, I just saw Adventurer David satisfactory smile. Haha. He seems pleased to have you as companion on this trip, {user_nick}. He wants to leave right now.

$Scout Fergus$
Aren't you suppose to go help Adventurer David with him slay Shadow Dark Scream in Sanctuary Core? I heard that's how it is decided…. You should check with Adventurer David.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Take care of yourself, it's not just you alone. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David${action:talk}
Heh… I was about to head towards Sanctuary Core. I will specially take you with me. Heh. Heh. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, I think you should do this alone.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Wh, Wh, What do you mean! What if I get a scratch while fighting Shadow Dark Scream? I need someone to put some ointment! I... I am not trying to take you because I feared Shadow Dark!!! Don't be full of yourself!!!

$Adventurer David$
You merciless guy!! Are you going to betray Scout Fergus's pure heart?! Look at his hopeful eyes! Come on, let's go to Sanctuary Core!!

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh.
…I will follow behind. No more question, let's just move on.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ugh. (Feels like I am the one doing it!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
I'm not ready yet. Why don't you go to Sanctuary Core first and just pretend to lure Shadow Dark Screamout !! Me, the great Adventurer David, will appear when the monster strikes and kill it with ONE blow!!

$Adventurer David$
Are you that touched that I'll be behind to protect you? Heh. Heh. Heh. Okay. Get going to Sanctuary Core now. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Yes? It is all a lie! </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Scout Fergus$
Adventurer David has just told me all about it. You guys manage to slay the Shadow Dark Scream? Haha. Seriously, Adventurer David is amazing. And I heard you,{user_nick}, were trembling with fear and even pass out... Are you feeling better now?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(What!! I was the one who kill the monster!!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Scout Fergus$
Hahaha. Don't be shamed. Haha. Even excellent adventurers get scared sometimes. It's okay! There is no doubt you, {user_nick}, are still a hero of Calderock Village.

$Scout Fergus$
Your eyes are filled with tears. Was it that scary? Haha. Good to know you are back safely, Adventurer David was worried sick of you, {user_nick}. …Anyways Adventurer David is just awesome! I was so surprised!

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Check with Scout Fergus.
You late, again! Heh. Heh. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I thought I'm the one who finishes the job?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Don't give me those eyes! This is a war… That's right! Most important things to adventurers are media play! fame! Heh. Heh. Heh…. I won't lose to such newbie like you who don't know anything! Heh. Heh. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Can anyone tell me what's going on? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David${action:talk}
This is called strategy! strategy! Heh. Heh. Heh. How dare you showing off yourself front of me without even knowing this basic tactic of being an adventurer. I cannot believe this. You are shame. Heh. I won't lose against the newbie!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why don't you talk to Argenta personally….</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
How dare you to tell me not to go near Lady Argenta? You will pay for what you have done! Heh. Heh. Heh. Just you wait!!

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Please let my beautiful Lady Argentaknow I said hello. Tell her that I, Adventurer David, will visit her after I rip you apart, {user_nick}, in person!! Ha. Ha. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Please let my beautiful Lady Argentaknow I said hello. Tell her that I, Adventurer David, will visit her after I rip you apart, {user_nick}, in person!! Ha. Ha. Heh.

$Argenta$
Finally you are back! I always thought it was you whenever i heard footstep near Cristal Stream.
What is it? You got tricked to going Sanctuary Core by yourself?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I didn't get fooled… I mean.. Yah I did….</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
This world is full of fools? You, fool, and that Adventurer David something fool. I think you are the best fool for being fooled by a fool.

$Argenta$
There's nothing we can do now. I'll we be leaving for Saint Haven soon, Just ignore such fellows like him.
Slaves like you just can't seem to do a proper job.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Argenta$
You are such a bother. You are like a kid playing in a pool, can't relax having you around. I need a new slave before we head out to Saint Haven. For the time being, you work hard and don't be lazy.

journal.title: Argenta's Depression
journal.contents:
Argenta seems to be uncomfortable having Adventurer David wandering around her. Let's go to Cristal Stream and talk to Adventurer David.

Cristal Stream → Adventurer David
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer David at Cristal Stream

journal.title: Reputation of Adventurer David I
journal.contents:
Adventurer David wants you to go to Calderock Village and ask Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard about his reputation. It's annoying, but let's just do what he say.

Calderock Village → Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard in Calderock Village
journal.todo_msg: Please go talk to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard.

journal.title: Reputation of Adventurer David II
journal.contents:
Deckard asks you to talk to people who gave Adventurer David a job to hear about his reputation. Let's hear it from Merchant May.

Calderock Village→ Merchant May
journal.destination: Talk to Merchant May in Calderock Village
journal.todo_msg: Please go talk to Merchant May.

journal.title: Reputation of Adventurer David III
journal.contents:
Adventurer David's reputation is surprisingly decent. However, it feels like he is more of messenger boy than an adventurer. Let's go talk to Master Sorceress Tiana to verify Adventurer David's reputation as Merchant May suggested.

Calderock Village → Master Sorceress Tiana
journal.destination: Talk to Tiana in Calderock Village
journal.todo_msg: Please go talk to Master Sorceress Tiana.

journal.title: Reputation of Adventurer David IV
journal.contents:
Enough of Adventurer David's reputation. Let's go back to Adventurer David in Cristal Stream.

Cristal Stream → Adventurer David
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer David at Cristal Stream
journal.todo_msg: Please go report to Adventurer David at Cristal Stream.

journal.title: Reputation of Adventurer David V
journal.contents:
It seems like Adventurer David was bragging to Scout Fergus while I was gone. Kind of annoying but let's just talk to Scout Fergus.

Cristal Stream → Scout Fergus
journal.todo_msg: Please go talk to Scout Fergus at Cristal Stream.

journal.title: Adventurer David's rant
journal.contents:
In Scout Fergus's word, Adventurer David has promise to go to Sanctuary Core. Let's confirm with Adventurer David.

Cristal Stream → Adventurer David
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer David at Cristal Stream
journal.todo_msg: Please confirm the truth with Adventurer David at Cristal Stream.

journal.title: Uncertain departure
journal.contents:
Being forced to go Sanctuary Core and defeat Shadow Dark Scream. Let's just ignore Adventurer David even though he claims that he will be right behind.

Gray Ruins(Sanctuary Entrance) → Sanctuary Core
journal.todo_msg: Please defeat Shadow Dark Scream at Sanctuary Core.

journal.title: Despicable Adventurer David
journal.contents:
David who said he would come to Sanctuary Core did not come. Return to Cristal Stream and ask Adventurer David why.

Cristal Stream → David
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer David at Cristal Stream
journal.todo_msg: Please go talk to Adventurer David back in Cristal Stream.

journal.title: One step too late!
journal.contents:
Adventurer David took a step ahead and went around spreading lies, now mistook Adventurer David as a brave adventurer. It's very depressing but since nothing can be done about this, let's go back to Gray Ruins and report to Argenta.

Gray Ruins → Argenta
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at Gray Ruins
journal.todo_msg: Update Argenta in Gray Ruins about the situation.
